Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized that India's focus is on playing good cricket and not on records.
Babar Azam declared that Pakistan aims to break India's World Cup jinx.
Shubman Gill has rejoined the team and is 99 percent available to play.
Pakistan's batting change against Sri Lanka worked well with Abdullah Shafique scoring a century on his debut.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is a high-pressure game with a capacity crowd expected.
Pakistan has never beaten India in the World Cup, making this a significant opportunity for them.
The match is a golden opportunity for Pakistan to perform in front of a large fan base.
